confirm_delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this knowledge?

form_uploadFile_uploadText.message: Drag and drop a file here or click to upload

noEmbeddingModel.message: Please add an embedding model from the RAG settings page first

privateModeDescription.message: Firefox Private Mode does not support saving data to IndexedDB. Please add knowledge base from a normal window.

ragWorkspace_description.message: Configure knowledge search (RAG) options, run quick searches, and use Chat with grounded answers.

ragWorkspace_subtitleRag.message: Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) lets the assistant ground answers in your media, notes, and other indexed knowledge sources.

ragWorkspace_autoRagHelp.message: When enabled, the Chat workspace will run a knowledge (RAG) search before answering each message.

ragWorkspace_autoRagScopeHelp.message: This setting applies to replies in the main Chat view and sidepanel.

ragWorkspace_ragUnsupportedTitle.message: RAG search is not available on this server

ragWorkspace_ragUnsupportedDescription.message: This tldw server does not advertise the RAG endpoints. Open Diagnostics to see which APIs are available, then upgrade or reconfigure your server to enable RAG search.

ragWorkspace_searchInactiveHelp.message: Connect to your tldw server before running a search.

ragWorkspace_searchActiveHelp.message: Search runs against your configured RAG sources. Use Chat for multi-source knowledge search across media, notes, and more.

ragWorkspace_noResults.message: No RAG results yet. Enter a query to search your corpus.

ragWorkspace_advancedHelp.message: Optional: paste a JSON object with any UnifiedRAGRequest fields (e.g., strategy, enable_reranking). Leave blank to use defaults.

ragWorkspace_advancedInvalid.message: Invalid JSON for advanced RAG options.

ragWorkspace_advancedFlagsHelp.message: Tweak common UnifiedRAGRequest flags without editing JSON.

ragWorkspace_chatModeRagOn.message: Chat is using knowledge search (RAG) for replies.

ragWorkspace_chatModeRagOff.message: Toggle “Use RAG for every reply” to ground answers in your indexed content.

ragWorkspace_chatHint.message: Open the main Chat tab to see full conversation history with these knowledge (RAG) settings applied.

ragWorkspace_chatOpenPlayground.message: Open Chat with these knowledge search settings

rag_searchFailed.message: RAG search failed. Try again or check Diagnostics.

empty_demoTitle.message: Explore Knowledge QA in demo mode

empty_demoDescription.message: This demo shows how Knowledge QA can run RAG searches over sample content. Connect your own server later to search your own transcripts and documents.

empty_demoExample1.message: Try quick RAG searches and inspect results and citations.

empty_demoExample2.message: Connect your own server to enable Knowledge QA over your real media and notes.

empty_connectDescription.message: To use Knowledge QA and RAG search, first connect to your tldw server.

empty_connectExample1.message: Open Settings → tldw server to add your server URL.

empty_connectExample2.message: Use Diagnostics if your server is running but not reachable.
